com.algolia.instantsearch.ui.databinding

Class BindingHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.algolia.instantsearch.ui.databinding.BindingHelper

  • public class BindingHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains the BindingAdapter used for gathering bound attributes.

public static java.lang.String setVariantForView(@NonNull

        Associates programmatically a view with its variant, taking it from its `variant` layout attribute.
        Parameters:
        view - any existing view.
        attrs - the view's AttributeSet.
        Returns:
        the previous variant for this view, if any.

      • getVariantForView

        @Nullable
public static java.lang.String getVariantForView(@NonNull
                                                           android.view.View view)
        Returns the variant associated with the view.
        Parameters:
        view - a View that is associated to an index through databinding.
        Returns:
        the variant name or null if unspecified.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the view is not part of a databinding layout.

      • getFullAttribute

        @NonNull
public static java.lang.String getFullAttribute(android.view.View view,
                                                         @Nullable
                                                         java.lang.String rawAttribute)
        Gets the full version of an attribute, with its eventual prefix and suffix.
        Parameters:
        view - the view mapped to this attribute.
        rawAttribute - the raw value of the attribute.
        Returns:
        the attribute value, prefixed and suffixed if any was specified on the view.
